colorSizes.M: Material has separate component named <Chip/> for rendering chips.By Default, the Chip has size:medium, color:default and variant:filled.
colorSizes.B: Bootstrap , you use the same <Badge/> for both chips and badges.You can use the pill attribute for showing chip like badges. By Default, it has background, bg:primary and no rounded borders. Bootstrap dosen't provide any size property/attribute for its Badge component, but you can trigger different sized by utilizing the fs-[x] , where 'x' ranges from [1,6], 1 being largest and 6 being smallest.

icons.M: Material has properties/attributes namely icon, deleteIcon and avatar. icon property takes an material icon component import from @mui/icons-material library and by default is placed at the start of the chip, whereas, the deleteIcon places the icon component at the end of the chip. avatar is used if you want to place your own media files in the chip. Also, if the onDelete property is specified, only then the deleteIcon is shown and by default a cross icon is displayed by material. You could also set clickable property to the chip to have the ripple effect provided by Material.
icons.B: Bootstrap dosen't provide any property/attribute for its component to place icon. But, you can use the <i></i> tags to place bootstrap icons at your desired position as shown below.

colorSizes.M:
<Chip label='Default Chip' /> 
 <Chip label='Primary' color='primary' variant='outlined' /> 
 <Chip label='Secondary' color='secondary' variant='outlined' /> 
 <Chip label='Error' color='error' variant='outlined/ /> 
 <Chip label='Info' color='info' size='small' variant='filled' /> 
 <Chip label='Success' color='success' size='small' /> 
 <Chip label='Warning' color='warning' size='small' />
colorSizes.B:
<Badge pill> Primary Default </Badge>
 <Badge pill bg='success' className='fs-1' > Success </Badge> 
 <Badge pill bg='danger' className='fs-2' > Danger </Badge> 
 <Badge pill bg='warning' className='fs-3' > Warning! </Badge> 
 <Badge pill bg='info' className='fs-4' > Info </Badge>
 <Badge pill bg='light' className='fs-5' > Light </Badge> 
 <Badge pill bg='dark' className='fs-6' > Dark </Badge>

icons.M:
<Chip clickable icon={<AddCircle />} label='Add Item' color='primary' /> 
 <Chip clickable icon={<AddCircleOutline />} label='Add Item' variant='outlined' color='success' /> 
 <Chip clickable avatar={<Avatar>M</Avatar>} label='Avatar' color='primary' /> 
 <Chip deleteIcon={<Delete />} label='Delete Chip' onDelete={handleDelete} variant='filled' color='error' /> 
 <Chip label='Default Delete Chip' onDelete={handleDelete2} color='primary' />
icons.B: Success! Delete! handleDelete} >
